title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.10 - X-ray, consultation bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.10 - X-ray, consultation bills

State Regulations

Bills for X-ray and consultation rendered by a specialist
and bills for X-ray examination, diagnosis or treatment rendered by an X-ray
laboratory or bureau of a voluntary hospital licensed by the chair shall be
submitted for payment directly to the employer or carrier. These services must
be authorized in writing by the physician in attendance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
